channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to footpath, trip hazzards, 9th May
item.description:
Electrical supply cover raised, dropped curbs and uneven path surfaces. Also hole to right in front of street lamp.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Sandycroft Road, Churchdown

item.title: Large deep potholes in line with passenger tyres., 9th May
item.description:
These pot holes has got significantly deeper since we have had all the rain from 7.5.21. I have now witnessed a driver swerve in to on coming traffic lane to avoid it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Direction Sign in Need of Repair. Hales Road, Cheltenham, 9th May
item.description:
This relatively new sign has slowly fallen apart due to successive high winds. This sign needs altering if it’s to remain intact.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 144b Hales Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Deep pothole outside 16 Albert Street, 7th May
item.description:
Deep pothole along the road outside 16 Albert Street. Roughly where someone would usually cycle or ride a motorbike so hazardous to these road users in particular, especially given the amount of people travelling through by car. The whole road could do with being resurfaced

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 12 Albert Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Culvert on tributary of Isbourne full due to garden waste including rubble bag and board in stream, 4th May
item.description:
This area has had issues with localised flooding. Today I cleared garden waste from the first part of the grid but was unable to reach the second grate. The waste was brought down stream with other rubbish causing an obstruction. The grate is behind my property and that of my neighbour..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Birchwood Broadway Road, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in carriageway, 3rd May
item.description:
Please refer to image. This is a deep pothole which could easily damage vehicles.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 24 Littledown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old disconnected lamp post on lower high street, 4th May
item.description:
Good morning, there's a really old lamppost that's been disconnected but the stump set in the pavement hasn't been removed. It's been stuck there for years and makes the area look neglected. Please could you arrange to get rid of it and fix the surrounding pavement? Thanks so much, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 311 High Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass in play area, 2nd May
item.description:
Lots of broken glass in the skateboard area, down to anti-social behaviour. Not great for kids riding around on bikes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Lobleys Drive, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unevenroad and potholes on Albert Street, 2nd May
item.description:
Good morning, hope you're well. The surface of Albert Street is really uneven - the whole length of it is very bad and causing quite a lot of damage to residents' cars. It really needs fully resurfacing, please could you take a look? Thanks so much, Tabi

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 15 Albert Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Suffolk Square now has many potholes, the largest being on the East side of the square, 30th April
item.description:
These potholes are getting larger and becoming dangerous to cars and pedestrians. Each has a decorative yellow border to draw attention to it but parking on both sides make it impossible to avoid them. They have been present since before the start of 2021.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Faithfull House Suffolk Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
